column2: 'Daily Show' Supercut Sums Up Fox News' 'Red Meat Panic' In 59 Seconds Flat
column5: The great Fox News red meat freakout of April 2021 was remembered in a short but scathing “Daily Show” montage on Tuesday. Personalities on the conservative network over the weekend railed against the bogus report that President Joe Biden’s climate plan would slash the vast majority of red meat from Americans’ diets.
